item.title: Idumota Market, Location, Market Days, Parks and Shipments, Hotels
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.description: Idumota Market is a famous market in Lagos that is known for its significant sales of videos and many musical albums. The market is known as one of the oldest markets in Lagos.

item.title: Balogun Market, Location, Market Days, Parks and Shipments, Products
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.description: Balogun market is popular in Lagos, Nigeria. The market was created in 2019 near Lagos Island, Nigeria. This market serves as a significant hub for products such as wholesale clothing materials, electronics, jewelry, beverages, oil imports and exports, and so much more.

item.title: Requirements and Advantages of the Skilled Worker Visa in the UK
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.description: The Skilled Worker visa extends an invitation to eligible individuals, beckoning them to the UK to contribute their skills to an approved sponsor in a qualifying role. To qualify for this visa, candidates must amass a total of 70 points, a criterion determined by factors such as skill and salary levels, English language proficiency, and the receipt of a qualifying job offer from a UK employer holding a valid sponsorship license.

item.title: Find US ZIP Code Near Me – Postal Codes Lookup
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.description: Looking to identify a certain geographic location within the USA, here are US ZIP code lists by state. The US ZIP code is a 5-digit number used to determine certain zones for efficient mail delivery. The United States Postal Service (USPS) and other Parcel and Ship companies used this code to find the actual location in a given geographic space. To find a ZIP Code near me, consider the US ZIP Codes by State below.

item.title: Arik Air Booking Online – Flight Booking from Arik Airline
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.description: Are you looking to send your parcel within Nigeria and beyond? Consider the Arik Air Booking Online systems. Arik Airlines is the leading airline in West Africa, with domestic, regional, and international operations. Arik primarily operates from two hubs: the flagship office at Murtala Muhammed International Airport in Lagos and another office at Nnamdi Azikiwe International Airport in Abuja, where it oversees flight services to and from various African destinations.

item.title: How to Send Parcel with UPS | UPS – United States
item.dc:creator: Godfrey
item.description: If you are looking for how to send parcel with UPS in the United States, the process is simple. First Get your parcel ready, get a label for the parcel, and choose an option to send the parcel with UPS. All these processes are listed in this article.
